description:
Just watched as for the second time this week an employee of the Downtown Green Team watering the beautiful baskets of flowers hanging from the light fixtures on Orange St.  He runs so much water into the plant that it runs out onto the ground for over 5 minutes after he's done.  Also he waters the plants in the middle of the day further wasting water.  

Both are killing the plants.
address: 71 Orange St. New Haven, CT
